name: Exo-Suit
entries: Starting at 3rd level, your body is upgraded with magical technology. It can come in the form of mechanical enhancements, microscopic robots, or a gruesome combination of flesh and metal. It grants you enhanced fortitude, and other benefits.

items: You can replace your Dexterity with your Intelligence when calculating your Unarmored Defense.
Select from either Force, Poison, Acid, Lightning, or Thunder. You gain resistance to that damage type and deal an additional 1d4 of that type on a melee attack hit.
